description: What can be better than falling in love with the perfect pizza? How about having that pizza brought to you in a mobile fire truck? Vero Amore can bring you their authentic Neapolitan pizza directly to your next event using their one of a kind fire truck. Vero Amore translates to "True Love" in Italian and that is the best way to describe the feeling people get after taking their first bite of pizza from the Vero Amore Fire Truck.
name: Vero Amore
